name: Wampa
Lore: 'Sly, carnivorous beast which stalks the snow-packed tundra. Wampas frequently drag their prey to an ice cave for storage. They always prefer to devour their victims alive.',
Text: '* Ferocity = 3 + destiny. Habitat: Hoth sites. Deploy only to Wampa Cave or unoccupied marker site. Defeated characters are eaten or relocated to Wampa Cave (opponent of victim chooses).',
